overview: Jim has 21 years of experience leading the strategic development efforts of a variety of brands. His career covers a broad range of over 80 categories from packaged goods and beverages to financial services, software and technology. Jim has a broad range of experience including advertising, brand management, and market research. Some of the brands Jim has helped develop include Bank One, Cablevision, Capâ€™n Crunch, Darden Restaurants, Hyundai, Kodak, Microsoft, Ofoto, Oracle University, Sega, Showtime, SOAPnet, Suave, Virtual Makeover, Wachovia, and Zone.com. Jimâ€™s target experience spans B2B as well as B2C, including a strong track record marketing to broad audiences as well as specifically to key market segments including men, women, teens/tweens, children, Hispanics, and African Americans. Jim holds an MBA in Marketing from the University of Chicago, and a BA in US History from the University of Pennsylvania.
